item1:
依群组设定程序使用权限
Program permission management for groups
item2:
设定各个群组的程序使用权限
Set permissions for programs in each group
item4:
已建立好群组使用者的维护
Created group user data
item5:
群组编码、群组名称、群组管理员
Group ID, group name, group owner
item6:
程序数据、更新群组授权档
Program data, update group authorization data
item7:
如果无符合条件的群组数据，系统将提示查无此群组信息
If there is no matching group data, the system will prompt to find no such group information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选群组编码后点选Query查询群组授权数据
Enter query conditions or select group code and click Query to query group authorization data
